reviewText: an amazing yoga video for a home practice.
he is the real deal.....and his dvd's have an accessible and uplifting teaching style, amazing flow, great instruction, wonderful series--highly recommend!!!

I have been practicing yoga for many years and was expecting a challenging flow in this DVD.  Unfortunately, you do one set of sequences and then wait til the title appears and then do the next set.  I got bored, will probably sell on Ebay.

I love this video. If you want a great workout doing yoga, this is the video for you. I know - for some people this isn't the meditative "spirit" of yoga - but what I want when I do yoga is a really good workout. This will become a regular part of my workout routine. Thanks, Tony!
